question: Name of the award which is won by Sebastian Vettel of Ferrari.
option3: The Future Awards (The Future Project Nigeria)
explanation: Sebastian Vettel of Ferrari wins Hungarian Grand Prix won his fourth victory of the season. As Sebastian Vettel took the chequered flag at the Hungaroring to claim his fourth victory of the season, his chief title rival was selflessly surrendering the final spot on the podium to his Mercedes team-mate Valtteri Bottas.
